title: Everyone loves a Slash
body:
Well, I didn't win my company's costume contest. Can you even contemplate a country where I can't continually come in to work completely costumed as a creepy cuitar player from Cuns n' Coses? I can't. Geez. Oh well, life goes on, I suppose. It's not like any of the people who did win are starting their own theater or anything! So, in that respect, they're ALL losers.

*runs aways sobbing*

I will, however, post a picture-by-picture transformation sometime over the weekend. You'll watch in utter amazement as mild-mannerd Dan becomes STD-riddled Slash! Rock ON!
author: Dan

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: He was a hit. All the ladies around me were a-flutterin'. I think it was the tight pants he wore.
